text: Terror Train is a 1980 Canadian horror movie directed by first time director Roger Spottiswoode and starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Ben Johnson, Hart Bochner, Vanity, Anthony Sherwood, Timothy Webber, Joy Boushel. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 horror movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Roger Spottiswoode Category:American independent movies
title: Terror Train
